title: Statistical predictions of model(s) for a given Project-Experiment-Run combination (Payload)
description: Abstracted payload schema for tracking statistical results of an experiment-run

R2.description: Computed R-squared value given specified grid settings

MSE.description: Computed mean squared error of predictions given specified grid settings

MAE.description: Computed mean absolute error of predictions given specified grid settings

accuracy.description: Computed accuracy of predictions given specified grid settings

roc_auc_score.description: Computed ROC-AUC score of predictions given specified grid settings

pr_auc_score.description: Computed area under the Precision-Recall curve given specified grid settings

f_score.description: Computed f-score of predictions given specified grid settings

TPR.description: Computed sensitivity of predictions given specified grid settings

TNR.description: Computed specificity of predictions given specified grid settings

PPV.description: Computed precision of predictions given specified grid settings

NPV.description: Negative predictive value of predictions given specified grid settings

FPR.description: Computed precision of predictions given specified grid settings

FNR.description: Computed precision of predictions given specified grid settings

FDR.description: Computed precision of predictions given specified grid settings

TP.description: No. of true positives in predictions given specified grid settings

TN.description: No. of true negatives in predictions given specified grid settings

FP.description: No. of false positives in predictions given specified grid settings

FN.description: No. of false negatives in predictions given specified grid settings
